description: AKA The "Most likely to survive a zombie apocalypse plant collection." This group of plants contains the easiest care houseplants around.  They don't require much light or water and can survive almost anything or *anybody.*

Whether youâ€™re starting a plant family or building on it, these hand-selected easy to care for plants are perfect for less-than-ideal conditions. All four of these plants are incredibly easy, will adapt to nearly any available light, and are extremely forgiving. Their easy-going nature makes them perfect for office spaces, dorm rooms, and beginners.
data.title: Easy Peasy Plant Collection
